card.name: All Is Dust
card.property: Each player sacrifices all colored permanents they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The emergence of the Eldrazi isn't necessarily a bad thing, as long as you've already lived a fulfilling and complete life without regrets."—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

card.name: Artisan of Kozilek
card.property: When you cast this spell, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

card.name: Eldrazi Conscription
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +10/+10 and has trample and annihilator 2. (Whenever it attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The barest taste of Eldrazi power shatters both realms and identities.

card.name: Emrakul, the Aeons Torn
card.property: This spell can't be countered. When you cast this spell, take an extra turn after this one. Flying, protection from colored spells, annihilator 6 When Emrakul, the Aeons Torn is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.

card.name: Karn Liberated
card.property: +4: Target player exiles a card from their hand. −3: Exile target permanent. −14: Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanent cards exiled with Karn Liberated. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Kozilek, Butcher of Truth
card.property: When you cast this spell, draw four cards. Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.) When Kozilek, Butcher of Truth is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.

card.name: Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre
card.property: When you cast this spell, destroy target permanent. Indestructible Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.) When Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.

card.name: Ulamog's Crusher
card.property: Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.) Ulamog's Crusher attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ulamog is dead, and his brood is dying. Some of them just don't know it yet."—Nirthu, lone missionary

card.name: Ancestor's Chosen
card.property: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) When Ancestor's Chosen enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The will of all, by my hand done."

card.name: Angelic Renewal
card.property: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may sacrifice Angelic Renewal. If you do, return that card to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Angels watch over mortals wit heavy hearts, knowing what fate awaits them in the end.

card.name: Containment Priest
card.property: Flash If a nontoken creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some protection requires a bit of finesse.

card.name: Conviction
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+3. {W}: Return Conviction to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no greater coward than one who believes in nothing."

card.name: Dawn Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. • Regenerate target creature. • Counter target spell that targets you.

card.name: Daybreak Coronet
card.property: Enchant creature with another Aura attached to it Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has first strike, vigilance, and lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the deception of the gods yield to the pure light of day." —Brimaz, king of Oreskos

card.name: Emancipation Angel
card.property: Flying When Emancipation Angel enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You have done your best. I give you leave to rest."

card.name: Faith's Fetters
card.property: Enchant permanent When Faith's Fetters enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

card.name: Fiend Hunter
card.property: When Fiend Hunter enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature. When Fiend Hunter leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Gods Willing
card.property: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.) Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Honor the gods of Theros, and they will return the favor.

card.name: Heliod's Pilgrim
card.property: When Heliod's Pilgrim enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aura card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The blessings of Heliod are apparent for all to see.

card.name: Hero of Iroas
card.property: Aura spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Hero of Iroas, put a +1/+1 counter on Hero of Iroas.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My left has felled a cyclops. My right has slain a giant. I bring both to every fight."

card.name: Hyena Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has first strike. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Icatian Crier
card.property: {1} {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Create two 1/1 white Citizen creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A thousand years removed from her home, her news of war had lost its context, but not its relevance.

card.name: Lotus-Eye Mystics
card.property: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) When Lotus-Eye Mystics enters the battlefield, return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every action has a foreseen purpose.

card.name: Mammoth Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has vigilance. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Martyr of Sands
card.property: {1}, Reveal X white cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Sands: You gain three times X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only in our vulnerability is there true power, and that power is life itself."

card.name: Miraculous Recovery
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am the rock of the polis. Death only strengthens me."

card.name: Phalanx Leader
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Phalanx Leader, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His soldiers etch his words on the insides of their shields, their inspiration always in sight during battle.

card.name: Rally the Peasants
card.property: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you must go out at night, bring a mob." —Master of the Elgaud Cathars

card.name: Repel the Darkness
card.property: Tap up to two target creatures. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A boon to those who cannot see in the dark. A bane to those who live in it.

card.name: Resurrection
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Think of this new life not as a gift from the angels but as a command to fight for their cause once more.—War blessing of Serra

card.name: Reveillark
card.property: Flying When Reveillark leaves the battlefield, return up to two target creature cards with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Evoke {5}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Reya Dawnbringer
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You have not died until I consent."

card.name: Ronom Unicorn
card.property: Sacrifice Ronom Unicorn: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The aberrant magic of the Rimewind drew the unicorns back from the northern wastes to do battle once again.

card.name: Runed Halo
card.property: As Runed Halo enters the battlefield, choose a card name. You have protection from the chosen name. (You can't be targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything with that name.)

card.name: Sigil of the New Dawn
card.property: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, return that card to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sigil represents an honor that endures beyond death.

card.name: Skyspear Cavalry
card.property: Flying Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Pray her spear reaches you first. Her griffin is less kind.

card.name: Spirit Cairn
card.property: Whenever a player discards a card, you may pay {W}. If you do, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most beautiful souls shine even in death.

card.name: Sublime Archangel
card.property: Flying Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Other creatures you control have exalted. (If a creature has multiple instances of exalted, each triggers separately.)

card.name: Swift Reckoning
card.property: Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you may cast Swift Reckoning as though it had flash. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.) Destroy target tapped creature.

card.name: Tethmos High Priest
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Tethmos High Priest, return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death is tyranny. Like all tyranny, it must be opposed."

card.name: Wall of Reverence
card.property: Defender, flying At the beginning of your end step, you may gain life equal to the power of target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lives of elves are long, but their memories are longer. Even after death, they do not desert their homes.

card.name: Wandering Champion
card.property: Whenever Wandering Champion deals combat damage to a player, if you control a blue or red permanent, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Learn from your enemies, but do not tolerate them."

card.name: Wingsteed Rider
card.property: Flying Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Wingsteed Rider, put a +1/+1 counter on Wingsteed Rider.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Trust is the only bridle a pegasus will accept.

card.name: Aethersnipe
card.property: When Aethersnipe enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Evoke {1}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Archaeomancer
card.property: When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Words of power never disappear. They sleep, awaiting those with the will to rouse them."

card.name: Back to Basics
card.property: Nonbasic lands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A ruler wears a crown while the rest of us wear hats, but which would you rather have when it's raining?"—Barrin, *Principia*

card.name: Circular Logic
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your graveyard. Madness {U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Defy Gravity
card.property: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Flashback {U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On every plane in the Multiverse, there is magic, and someone is using it to fly.

card.name: Deranged Assistant
card.property: {T}, Put the top card of your library into your graveyard: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Garl, adjust the slurry dispensers. Garl, fetch more corpses. Garl, quit crying and give me your brain tissue. If he doesn't stop being so rude, I'm quitting."

card.name: Dig Through Time
card.property: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Disrupting Shoal
card.property: You may exile a blue card with converted mana cost X from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell if its converted mana cost is X.

card.name: Dreamscape Artist
card.property: {2} {U}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice a land: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He's mastered the art of sleight of land.

card.name: Eel Umbra
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Flight of Fancy
card.property: Enchant creature When Flight of Fancy enters the battlefield, draw two cards. Enchanted creature has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The view from above is an inspiration to the newly winged.

card.name: Foil
card.property: You may discard an Island card and another card rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Among wizards, poor timing is the most consistent mistake.

card.name: Forbidden Alchemy
card.property: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Frantic Search
card.property: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Untap up to three lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It took the banning of temporal manipulation at Tolaria West to teach its students the value of time.

card.name: Glen Elendra Archmage
card.property: Flying {U}, Sacrifice Glen Elendra Archmage: Counter target noncreature spell. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Iridescent Drake
card.property: Flying When Iridescent Drake enters the battlefield, put target Aura card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control attached to Iridescent Drake.

card.name: Just the Wind
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Madness {U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Laboratory Maniac
card.property: If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His mind whirled with grand plans, never thinking of what might happen if he were to succeed.

card.name: Living Lore
card.property: As Living Lore enters the battlefield, exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Living Lore's power and toughness are each equal to the exiled card's converted mana cost. Whenever Living Lore deals combat damage, you may sacrifice it. If you do, you may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Magus of the Bazaar
card.property: {T}: Draw two cards, then discard three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some trade in goods, some in secrets. My soul has walked the futures, and I offer the rare coin of possibility."

card.name: Mahamoti Djinn
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

card.name: Marang River Prowler
card.property: Marang River Prowler can't block and can't be blocked. You may cast Marang River Prowler from your graveyard as long as you control a black or green permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The currents of the Marang wash away both tracks and blood.

card.name: Mystic Retrieval
card.property: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Rise from the Tides
card.property: Create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dear brother, it's sweet that you have chosen to share your toys with Ludevic, but I too have found some new playmates." —Ghoulcaller Gisa

card.name: Rune Snag
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2} plus an additional {2} for each card named Rune Snag in each graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Concentration is key. Without it, a mage conjures nothing but a splitting headache."—Zur the Enchanter

card.name: Skywing Aven
card.property: Flying Discard a card: Return Skywing Aven to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am as the wind that bears me: harsh yet gentle, fleeting yet ever-present. Together we fly beyond imagination."

card.name: Sleight of Hand
card.property: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gambling with mages never is." —Remin, venerable monk

card.name: Snapcaster Mage
card.property: Flash When Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Stitched Drake
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your graveyard. Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best skaabs are more powerful and more beautiful than the sum of their parts." —Stitcher Geralf

card.name: Stitcher's Apprentice
card.property: {1} {U}, {T}: Create a 2/2 blue Homunculus creature token, then sacrifice a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oglor create life, Oglor take it away. Oglor god! … until Master return."

card.name: Stream of Consciousness
card.property: Target player shuffles up to four target cards from their graveyard into their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All things return to their beginnings. The waters that spill across the Kamitaki Falls flow to sea, only to be returned to her as the rain that joins the mighty river." —Dosan the Falling Leaf

card.name: Sultai Skullkeeper
card.property: When Sultai Skullkeeper enters the battlefield, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A skullkeeper is the first to arrive after the palace archers strike down intruders, probing their brains for choice bits of knowledge.

card.name: Talrand, Sky Summoner
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The seas are vast, but the skies are even more so. Why be content with one kingdom when I can rule them both?"

card.name: Temporal Manipulation
card.property: Take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Doing something at the last minute isn't so bad when you can make that minute last.

card.name: Think Twice
card.property: Draw a card. Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Either I know just the spell I need, or I'm about to."

card.name: Treasure Cruise
card.property: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Countless delights drift on the surface while dark schemes run below.

card.name: Unstable Mutation
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Visions of Beyond
card.property: Draw a card. If a graveyard has twenty or more cards in it, draw three cards instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The past is the foundation for all that exists in the present. We merely reconstruct what our ancestors have already discovered." —Sachimir, Sage of Memories

card.name: Whirlwind Adept
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Flowing Staff technique does not differentiate between offense and defense.

card.name: Appetite for Brains
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it with converted mana cost 4 or greater and exile that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just as with a peach, the first bite is always the juiciest.

card.name: Apprentice Necromancer
card.property: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Apprentice Necromancer: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A mage willing to dedicate his life to his craft.

card.name: Bitterblossom
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Lorwyn's brief evenings, the sun pauses at the horizon long enough for a certain species of violet to bloom with the fragrance of mischief.

card.name: Bloodflow Connoisseur
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodflow Connoisseur.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death not for survival but for vanity and pleasure? This is the decadence I sought to curb." —Sorin Markov

card.name: Bridge from Below
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, if Bridge from Below is in your graveyard, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. When a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, if Bridge from Below is in your graveyard, exile Bridge from Below.

card.name: Buried Alive
card.property: Search your library for up to three creature cards, put them into your graveyard, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The scrape of shovels and the tumble of cold dirt soon muffled their pleas.

card.name: Chainer's Edict
card.property: Target player sacrifices a creature. Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Crow of Dark Tidings
card.property: Flying When Crow of Dark Tidings enters the battlefield or dies, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

card.name: Dark Dabbling
card.property: Regenerate target creature. Draw a card. (The next time the creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.) Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, also regenerate each other creature you control.

card.name: Death Denied
card.property: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Takenuma was filled with a chorus of moans, shrieks, and wails. Some came from the living, some from the dying, and some, most horribly, from the dead.

card.name: Demonic Tutor
card.property: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Entomb
card.property: Search your library for a card and put that card into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Fume Spitter
card.property: Sacrifice Fume Spitter: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our archers made sport of it as it fumbled its way up the slag ridge. As it collapsed we thought ourselves safe, but the foul thing carried more than necrogen." —Adaran, Tangle hunter

card.name: Ghoulcaller's Accomplice
card.property: {3} {B}, Exile Ghoulcaller's Accomplice from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once in the box, we're all the same."

card.name: Ghoulsteed
card.property: {2} {B}, Discard two cards: Return Ghoulsteed from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It once served a cathar roadwatcher, patrolling the crossways between villages. Its hooves still carry it along the same path.

card.name: Golgari Thug
card.property: When Golgari Thug dies, put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. Dredge 4 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly four cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

card.name: Goryo's Vengeance
card.property: Return target legendary creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. Splice onto Arcane {2}{B} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Grave Scrabbler
card.property: Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.) When Grave Scrabbler enters the battlefield, if its madness cost was paid, you may return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand.

card.name: Grave Strength
card.property: Choose target creature. Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard, then put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each creature card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: So long as death follows life, the supply lines of the Sultai will never be cut.

card.name: Gurmag Angler
card.property: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If everything in the Gurmag Swamp hungers for human flesh, what bait could be more effective?

card.name: Last Gasp
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Takedowns in Valor's Reach are never meant to be lethal, but that doesn't mean they won't be incredibly painful.

card.name: Liliana of the Veil
card.property: +1: Each player discards a card. −2: Target player sacrifices a creature. −6: Separate all permanents target player controls into two piles. That player sacrifices all permanents in the pile of their choice.

card.name: Mark of the Vampire
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My 'condition' is a trial. The weak are consumed by it. The strong transcend it." —Sorin Markov

card.name: Mikaeus, the Unhallowed
card.property: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) Whenever a Human deals damage to you, destroy it. Other non-Human creatures you control get +1/+1 and have undying. (When a creature with undying dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Moan of the Unhallowed
card.property: Create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens. Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For a ghoul, every village is a buffet and every disaster is a reunion.

card.name: Offalsnout
card.property: Flash When Offalsnout leaves the battlefield, exile target card from a graveyard. Evoke {B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Olivia's Dragoon
card.property: Discard a card: Olivia's Dragoon gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Displays of Voldaren bloodlust are not restricted to glamorous banquets and lavish parties.

card.name: Reanimate
card.property: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Sanitarium Skeleton
card.property: {2} {B}: Return Sanitarium Skeleton from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His mind was lost long before his flesh.

card.name: Shirei, Shizo's Caretaker
card.property: Whenever a creature with power 1 or less is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may return that card to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step if Shirei, Shizo's Caretaker is still on the battlefield.

card.name: Shriekmaw
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) When Shriekmaw enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. Evoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Slum Reaper
card.property: When Slum Reaper enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's sent into unguilded districts by the Orzhov to collect the souls of those no one will miss.

card.name: Songs of the Damned
card.property: Add {B} for each creature card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not wind, but the breath of the dead.

card.name: Spoils of the Vault
card.property: Choose a card name. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with that name, then put that card into your hand. Exile all other cards revealed this way, and you lose 1 life for each of the exiled cards.

card.name: Tasigur, the Golden Fang
card.property: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) {2}{G/U}{G/U}: Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard, then return a nonland card of an opponent's choice from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Twins of Maurer Estate
card.property: Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Children, where are your parents?" —Reig, wandering monk, last words

card.name: Unburial Rites
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Flashback {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All crave the Blessed Sleep. Few receive it.

card.name: Unholy Hunger
card.property: Destroy target creature. Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Liliana viewed the attention of the angels as a testament to her power. Even so, they were an annoyance.

card.name: Akroan Crusader
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Crusader, create a 1/1 red Soldier creature token with haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An Akroan soldier's worth is measured by the number of swords raised by his battle cry.

card.name: Anger
card.property: Haste As long as Anger is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain, creatures you control have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Molten earth has no anger of its own. Only by infusing it with your own rage can the magma seethe and take shape." —Koth of the Hammer

card.name: Arena Athlete
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Arena Athlete, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Iroan Games award no medals. Athletes vie for a visit from Iroas, god of victory.

card.name: Balefire Dragon
card.property: Flying Whenever Balefire Dragon deals combat damage to a player, it deals that much damage to each creature that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If it comes for you, die boldly or die swiftly—for die you will.

card.name: Brazen Scourge
card.property: Haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Driven by an insatiable hunger, gremlins never cease feeding. They can destroy a lifetime of work in just a few moments.

card.name: Conflagrate
card.property: Conflagrate deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Flashback—{R}{R}, Discard X cards. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Desperate Ritual
card.property: Add {R}{R}{R}. Splice onto Arcane {1}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Faithless Looting
card.property: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Avacyn has abandoned us! We have nothing left except what we can take!"

card.name: Fiery Temper
card.property: Fiery Temper deals 3 damage to any target. Madness {R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Firewing Phoenix
card.property: Flying {1}{R}{R}{R}: Return Firewing Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When a phoenix nests in a volcano, we rejoice, for it means a hundred years of war." —Golmak, Keldon warlord

card.name: Furnace Celebration
card.property: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, you may pay {2}. If you do, Furnace Celebration deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing impresses goblins more than something that's bound to kill them.

card.name: Gamble
card.property: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, discard a card at random, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "STUFF AND SUNDRIES AND MUNITIONS!"—Breeches, gunner of the *Belligerent*

card.name: Generator Servant
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Generator Servant: Add {C}{C}. If that mana is spent on a creature spell, it gains haste until end of turn. (That creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

card.name: Hissing Iguanar
card.property: Whenever another creature dies, you may have Hissing Iguanar deal 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Ingot Chewer
card.property: When Ingot Chewer enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact. Evoke {R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elementals are ideas given form. This one is the idea of "smashitude."

card.name: Lava Spike
card.property: Lava Spike deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not the most subtle incantation, but it gets the point across.

card.name: Mad Prophet
card.property: Haste {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen it. Seen the end, seen the beginning, the beginning of the end. Not death, no, no. Transcendence!"

card.name: Magmaw
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice a nonland permanent: Magmaw deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The purpose of existence is simple: everything is fuel for the magmaw." —Jaji, magmaw worshipper

card.name: Malevolent Whispers
card.property: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. Madness {3}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Molten Birth
card.property: Create two 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens, then flip a coin. If you win the flip, return Molten Birth to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Few can coax the creatures within the magma to be cooled and take form." —Koth of the Hammer

card.name: Nightbird's Clutches
card.property: Up to two target creatures can't block this turn. Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shiny polished silver can ward off many creatures, but it attracts others.

card.name: Raid Bombardment
card.property: Whenever a creature you control with power 2 or less attacks, Raid Bombardment deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins in the first wave of a fire raid always bemoan the aim of everyone else.

card.name: Reckless Charge
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Reckless Wurm
card.property: Trample Madness {2}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bred for battle in the Grand Coliseum, these wurms annihilated whole ecosystems when released into the wild.

card.name: Rolling Temblor
card.property: Rolling Temblor deals 2 damage to each creature without flying. Flashback {4}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When demons open a path to your front door, it's time to move.

card.name: Seismic Assault
card.property: Discard a land card: Seismic Assault deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In a war for survival, Dominaria itself became a weapon. The malice is gone, but the danger remains."—Jhoira

card.name: Seize the Day
card.property: Untap target creature. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Soul's Fire
card.property: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An avatar he sculpts of anger and flame.

card.name: Sparkspitter
card.property: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 3/1 red Elemental creature token named Spark Elemental. It has trample, haste, and "At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Elemental."

card.name: Squee, Goblin Nabob
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return Squee, Goblin Nabob from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If Yawgmoth meant Squee's immortality as a curse, no one ever told Squee."—Karn

card.name: Thermo-Alchemist
card.property: Defender {T}: Thermo-Alchemist deals 1 damage to each opponent. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, untap Thermo-Alchemist.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Madness can't touch a mind ignited by genius."

card.name: Through the Breach
card.property: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step. Splice onto Arcane {2}{R}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Undying Rage
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block. When Undying Rage is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Undying Rage to its owner's hand.

card.name: Vexing Devil
card.property: When Vexing Devil enters the battlefield, any opponent may have it deal 4 damage to them. If a player does, sacrifice Vexing Devil.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not any fun until someone loses an eye.

card.name: Young Pyromancer
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Immolation is the sincerest form of flattery.

card.name: Basking Rootwalla
Become Immense
card.property: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Target creature gets +6/+6 until end of turn.

card.name: Boar Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From in here, everything looks like dinner."

card.name: Boneyard Wurm
card.property: Boneyard Wurm's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only thing it likes more than discovering a pit of bones is adding to it.

card.name: Brawn
card.property: Trample As long as Brawn is in your graveyard and you control a Forest, creatures you control have trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "'I have arrived,' bellowed Brawn, and the plane shuddered."—*Scroll of Beginnings*

card.name: Crushing Canopy
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy target creature with flying. • Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not mistake your lofty vantage point for safety."—Shaper Tuvasa

card.name: Devoted Druid
card.property: {T}: Add {G}. Put a -1/-1 counter on Devoted Druid: Untap Devoted Druid.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mana lurks in all things, even in the depths of one's own heart."

card.name: Eternal Witness
card.property: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She remembers every word spoken, from the hero's oath to the baby's cry.

card.name: Fauna Shaman
card.property: {G}, {T}, Discard a creature card: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She wears the talismans of every creature she can evoke.

card.name: Fecundity
card.property: Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life is eternal. A lifetime is ephemeral.

card.name: Golgari Brownscale
card.property: When Golgari Brownscale is put into your hand from your graveyard, you gain 2 life. Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

card.name: Golgari Grave-Troll
card.property: Golgari Grave-Troll enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature card in your graveyard. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Golgari Grave-Troll: Regenerate Golgari Grave-Troll. Dredge 6 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly six cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

card.name: Groundskeeper
card.property: {1} {G}: Return target basic land card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "While the church thinks in terms of legacies, others think in terms of eternities."

card.name: Hero of Leina Tower
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Hero of Leina Tower, you may pay {X}. If you do, put X +1/+1 counters on Hero of Leina Tower.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You cannot achieve greatness if its seed has not already been planted in your heart."

card.name: Hooting Mandrills
card.property: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Interlopers in Sultai territory usually end up as crocodile chow or baboon bait.

card.name: Kodama's Reach
card.property: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The land grows only where the kami will it."—Dosan the Falling Leaf

card.name: Life from the Loam
card.property: Return up to three target land cards from your graveyard to your hand. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

card.name: Miming Slime
card.property: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We paid the Simic very well for this capability, but we should quickly recoup our expenses in saved wages." —Milana, Orzhov prelate

card.name: Noble Hierarch
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She protects the sacred groves from blight, drought, and the Unbeholden.

card.name: Nourishing Shoal
card.property: You may exile a green card with converted mana cost X from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. You gain X life.

card.name: Pattern of Rebirth
card.property: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, that creature's controller may search their library for a creature card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle their library.

card.name: Penumbra Wurm
card.property: Trample When Penumbra Wurm dies, create a 6/6 black Wurm creature token with trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its ferocity cannot be contained in one lifetime.

card.name: Prey Upon
card.property: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You don't find many old werewolf hunters."—Paulin, trapper of Somberwald

card.name: Pulse of Murasa
card.property: Return target creature or land card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. You gain 6 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Little flower twirl and bloom, arise from this your rocky tomb. Little warrior slash and brawl, be born again to free us all."

card.name: Satyr Wayfinder
card.property: When Satyr Wayfinder enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first satyr to wake after a revel must search for the site of the next one.

card.name: Shed Weakness
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You may remove a -1/-1 counter from it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To prepare for the Trial of Strength, nagas shed their old skin—and with it their scars, their doubts, and their fears.

card.name: Snake Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card." Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Spider Spawning
card.property: Create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach for each creature card in your graveyard. Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Spider Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.) Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Staunch-Hearted Warrior
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Staunch-Hearted Warrior, put two +1/+1 counters on Staunch-Hearted Warrior.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As soon as she faces a monster, she begins composing its epitaph.

card.name: Stingerfling Spider
card.property: Reach When Stingerfling Spider enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The juiciest prey is that which grows lazy, thinking itself beyond the reach of danger.

card.name: Tarmogoyf
card.property: Tarmogoyf's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What doesn't grow, dies. And what dies grows the tarmogoyf.

card.name: Travel Preparations
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures. Flashback {1}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Visiting a shrine at the start of a journey makes the traveler more likely to finish it.

card.name: Vengevine
card.property: Haste Whenever you cast a spell, if it's the second creature spell you cast this turn, you may return Vengevine from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Leave but a shred of root and it will return, bursting with vigor.

card.name: Verdant Eidolon
card.property: {G}, Sacrifice Verdant Eidolon: Add three mana of any one color. Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, you may return Verdant Eidolon from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Walker of the Grove
card.property: When Walker of the Grove leaves the battlefield, create a 4/4 green Elemental creature token. Evoke {4}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Wickerbough Elder
card.property: Wickerbough Elder enters the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it. {G}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from Wickerbough Elder: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Living scarecrows make a mockery of the natural order. Dead ones make fine hats."

card.name: Wild Hunger
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains trample until end of turn. Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Otto the Hunter was filled with many grand ambitions. The snake was filled only with Otto.

card.name: Wild Mongrel
card.property: Discard a card: Wild Mongrel gets +1/+1 and becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Woodfall Primus
card.property: Trample When Woodfall Primus enters the battlefield, destroy target noncreature permanent. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Angel of Despair
card.property: Flying When Angel of Despair enters the battlefield, destroy target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I feel in them a sense of duty and commitment, yet I can feel nothing else. It is as if their duty is to an empty void."—Razia, Boros archangel

card.name: Blast of Genius
card.property: Choose any target. Draw three cards, then discard a card. Blast of Genius deals damage equal to the discarded card's converted mana cost to that permanent or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ral Zarek's brainstorms bring actual thunder and lightning.

card.name: Countersquall
card.property: Counter target noncreature spell. Its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each of the twenty-three winds of Esper is named and chronicled, and every possible interaction with the flow of magic is exhaustively detailed.

card.name: Gaddock Teeg
card.property: Noncreature spells with converted mana cost 4 or greater can't be cast. Noncreature spells with {X} in their mana costs can't be cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: So great are his wisdom and spirit that many who have met him say that they stood before a giant of a man and talked to the wisest of the four winds.

card.name: Garna, the Bloodflame
card.property: Flash When Garna, the Bloodflame enters the battlefield, return to your hand all creature cards in your graveyard that were put there from anywhere this turn. Other creatures you control have haste.

card.name: Golgari Charm
card.property: Choose one — • All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn. • Destroy target enchantment. • Regenerate each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the rest of Ravnica sneer. One way or another, they all end up in the undercity."—Jarad

card.name: Leovold, Emissary of Trest
card.property: Each opponent can't draw more than one card each turn. Whenever you or a permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm sure we can come to an arrangement."

card.name: Lord of Extinction
card.property: Lord of Extinction's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The forlorn cries of the dead combine to make its laugh.

card.name: Maelstrom Pulse
card.property: Destroy target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: During the collision of the shards, entire ways of life disappeared without a trace.

card.name: Reviving Vapors
card.property: Reveal the top three cards of your library and put one of them into your hand. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost. Put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

card.name: Sigarda, Host of Herons
card.property: Flying, hexproof Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to sacrifice permanents.

card.name: Sovereigns of Lost Alara
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may search your library for an Aura card that could enchant that creature, put it onto the battlefield attached to that creature, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Urban Evolution
card.property: Draw three cards. You may play an additional land this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the Simic released more of their krasis experiments, they required new habitats, always at the expense of the locals.

card.name: Vengeful Rebirth
card.property: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. If you return a nonland card to your hand this way, Vengeful Rebirth deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to any target. Exile Vengeful Rebirth.

card.name: Warleader's Helix
card.property: Warleader's Helix deals 4 damage to any target and you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no time to remedy our enemies' ignorance. Blast it out of them." —Aurelia

card.name: Beckon Apparition
card.property: Exile target card from a graveyard. Create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The foyer is littered with the coins it demands but can no longer hold.

card.name: Canker Abomination
card.property: As Canker Abomination enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. Canker Abomination enters the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it for each creature that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once the hideous disease takes hold, it spreads through both bark and mind.

card.name: Dimir Guildmage
card.property: ({U/B} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.) {3}{U}: Target player draws a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. {3}{B}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Double Cleave
card.property: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If at first you don't succeed, hit them again.

card.name: Fulminator Mage
card.property: Sacrifice Fulminator Mage: Destroy target nonbasic land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Burn, suffer, and trouble me no more."

card.name: Kitchen Finks
card.property: When Kitchen Finks enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Accept one favor from an ouphe, and you're doomed to accept another.

card.name: Murderous Redcap
card.property: When Murderous Redcap enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to its power to any target. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Plumeveil
card.property: Flash Defender, flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was vast, a great sheet of soaring wings, and equally silent. It caught us unawares and blocked our view of the kithkin stronghold." —Grensch, merrow cutthroat

card.name: Rakdos Shred-Freak
card.property: Haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If there were such a thing as a soul, I think it would be behind the gallbladder but above the kidneys."

card.name: Safehold Elite
card.property: Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not even death will keep her from her mission.

card.name: Scuzzback Marauders
card.property: Trample Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Shielding Plax
card.property: ({G/U} can be paid with either {G} or {U}.) Enchant creature When Shielding Plax enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.

card.name: Slippery Bogle
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ogle the bogle, or goggle the boggle? Doesn't matter. You weren't going to catch it anyway.

card.name: Turn to Mist
card.property: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Did you expect me to dodge? How quaint." —Olka, mistmeadow witch

card.name: Fire // Ice
card.property: Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. // Tap target permanent. Draw a card.

alternate.name: Fire
alternate.property: Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.

alternate.name: Ice
alternate.property: Tap target permanent. Draw a card.

card.name: Cathodion
card.property: When Cathodion dies, add {C}{C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Instead of creating a tool that would be damaged by heat, the Thran built one that was charged by it.

card.name: Engineered Explosives
card.property: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.) {2}, Sacrifice Engineered Explosives: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Engineered Explosives.

card.name: Heap Doll
card.property: Sacrifice Heap Doll: Exile target card from a graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I know one night it won't come back. Then I'll know it's truly done its job."—Braenna, cobblesmith

card.name: Mana Vault
card.property: Mana Vault doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4}. If you do, untap Mana Vault. At the beginning of your draw step, if Mana Vault is tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.

card.name: Myr Servitor
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Myr Servitor is on the battlefield, each player returns all cards named Myr Servitor from their graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Krark Clan enjoys pulling them apart just to watch them reassemble one another.

card.name: Patchwork Gnomes
card.property: Discard a card: Regenerate Patchwork Gnomes.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One wizard's trash is another wizard's roving gang of abominations.

card.name: Phyrexian Altar
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Unskin these impure bodies, Great Yawgmoth, that flesh may welcome your blessings."—*Phyrexian Scriptures*

card.name: Platinum Emperion
card.property: Your life total can't change. (You can't gain or lose life. You can't pay any amount of life except 0.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It ignores such insignificant forces as time, entropy, and death.

card.name: Prismatic Lens
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A capable mage can tune its focus, refracting mana through each disk in turn to cast any spell they desire.

card.name: Vessel of Endless Rest
card.property: When Vessel of Endless Rest enters the battlefield, put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Ancient Tomb
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C}. Ancient Tomb deals 2 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no glory to be gained in the kingdom of the dead.—Vec tomb inscription

card.name: Cavern of Souls
card.property: As Cavern of Souls enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type, and that spell can't be countered.

card.name: Celestial Colonnade
card.property: Celestial Colonnade enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}. {3}{W}{U}: Until end of turn, Celestial Colonnade becomes a 4/4 white and blue Elemental creature with flying and vigilance. It's still a land.

card.name: Creeping Tar Pit
card.property: Creeping Tar Pit enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. {1}{U}{B}: Creeping Tar Pit becomes a 3/2 blue and black Elemental creature until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Dakmor Salvage
card.property: Dakmor Salvage enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}. Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

card.name: Dark Depths
card.property: Dark Depths enters the battlefield with ten ice counters on it. {3}: Remove an ice counter from Dark Depths. When Dark Depths has no ice counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, create Marit Lage, a legendary 20/20 black Avatar creature token with flying and indestructible.

card.name: Desolate Lighthouse
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}{U}{R}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A lonely sentinel facing gales, hurricanes, and tides of homicidal spirits.

card.name: Flagstones of Trokair
card.property: {T}: Add {W}. When Flagstones of Trokair is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dust-spiked winds eroded the stones, but the ground where they had stood still holds power.

card.name: Karakas
card.property: {T}: Add {W}. {T}: Return target legendary creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Lavaclaw Reaches
card.property: Lavaclaw Reaches enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}. {1}{B}{R}: Until end of turn, Lavaclaw Reaches becomes a 2/2 black and red Elemental creature with "{X}: This creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn." It's still a land.

card.name: Mage-Ring Network
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Put a storage counter on Mage-Ring Network. {T}, Remove any number of storage counters from Mage-Ring Network: Add {C} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Mistveil Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W}.) Mistveil Plains enters the battlefield tapped. {W}, {T}: Put target card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library. Activate this ability only if you control two or more white permanents.

card.name: Phyrexian Tower
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Add {B}{B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yawgmoth is dead, and his citadels lie empty. But there will always be some who seek power at any price."—Karn

card.name: Raging Ravine
card.property: Raging Ravine enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}. {2}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, Raging Ravine becomes a 3/3 red and green Elemental creature with "Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it." It's still a land.

card.name: Rogue's Passage
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rumors quickly spread among thieves about a labyrinth without walls and a prize beyond all measures of worth.

card.name: Stirring Wildwood
card.property: Stirring Wildwood enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. {1}{G}{W}: Until end of turn, Stirring Wildwood becomes a 3/4 green and white Elemental creature with reach. It's still a land.

card.name: Terramorphic Expanse
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Take two steps north into the unsettled future, south into the unquiet past, east into the present day, or west into the great unknown.

card.name: Thespian's Stage
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Thespian's Stage becomes a copy of target land, except it has this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Amid rumors of war, the third act of *The Absolution of the Guildpact* was quickly rewritten as a tragedy.

card.name: Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth
card.property: Each land is a Swamp in addition to its other land types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yawgmoth's corpse is a wound in the universe. His foul blood seeps out, infecting the land with his final curse."—Lord Windgrace
